abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "BasisOfRecord is one of (Observation, Human Observation, Machine Observation)", "MediaType is Image", "OccurrenceStatus is Present", "TaxonKey is Urtica dioica L." ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from ALA species sightings and OzAtlas 1 records from Earth Guardians Weekly Feed 2 records from BoBO - Botanic Garden and Botanical Museum Berlin Observations 3 records from Water Colours of Fungi by Konrad Schieferdecker at the Botanische Staatssammlung München 4 records from NMNH Extant Specimen Records (USNM, US) 4 records from Collection contest 4 records from India Biodiversity Portal publication grade dataset 6 records from Photographs of higher plants, mosses, fungi, lichens, and algae 6 records from "Flora of Russia" on iNaturalist: a trusted backlog 8 records from Collections of Bioclass, school #179, Moscow 11 records from Occurrence Data of Vascular Plants collected or compiled for the Flora of Bavaria 13 records from Löydös Open Finnish Observation Database 13 records from Biodiversity4all Research-Grade Observations 20 records from Lajitietokeskus/FinBIF - Notebook, general observations 20 records from Vascular plants in Danish coastal meadows 31 records from Estonian Naturalists’ Society 58 records from Images and observations of mostly edible plants in Stephen Barstow’s Edible Garden in Norway, taken between 2005 and 2014 173 records from Artportalen (Swedish Species Observation System) 176 records from Species recordings from the Danish National portal Arter.dk 330 records from Norwegian Species Observation Service 2410 records from Pl@ntNet observations 9219 records from Observation.org, Nature data from around the World 41130 records from iNaturalist Research-grade Observations
